Welcome Home to Highland Gardens!
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath, approximately 1064 Sq.
Ft.
Positioned in the heart of Silicon Valley, Highland Gardens offers its residents the comfort of newly renovated apartments with a variety of floor plans.
This rental community is in close proximity to major regional employers such as Google, Facebook, Apple, Symantec, Microsoft and others.
Our fabulous updated community delivers a new fitness center, swimming pool with a brand new BBQ and cabana.
The spacious units include full-sized washer/dryer units, brand new A/C units, new appliances, private patios and granite countertops.
With Downtown Mountain View just minutes away, Highland Gardens is easily accessible to some of the best restaurants, bars and shopping malls in the Tech Hub of the World.
Near Google, Symantec, Stanford, Microsoft, etc.
Pricing and availability are subject to change.
Please contact our leasing office for current pricing and specials.
Pet Policy
We allow 2 pets per apartment.
Pet deposit is $500 and pet rent is $50 per pet/Dog $35 for cats.
Breed restrictions and weigh limit does apply.
